alert.note: Alert for Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 8:36AM CST until December 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills will be as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Parts of Northern Arkansas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 AM Thursday to noon CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
